en.successful: Moved object '$object' to ($x,$y) successfully. Your updated image is attached.
en.out_of_bounds: Invalid move: ($x,$y) is out of bounds. Please try again!
en.obj_not_found: Invalid move: Your image has now object with ID '$object'. Please try again!

zh-CN.successful: 已成功将图标 '$object' 移动到 ($x,$y)。
zh-CN.out_of_bounds: 无效移动：($x,$y) 超出边界。请重试！
zh-CN.obj_not_found: 无效移动：你的图片中没有 ID 为 '$object' 的图标。请重试！
